id.description: Stable UUID for this relic metadata record.

label.description: Short human-readable name for the relic.

description.description: Longer free-form description of the relic.

maintainer.description: Optional current maintainer if different from author.

createdAt.description: ISO-8601 timestamp when this relic was first created.

tags.description: Optional tags describing this relic (stage, lane, topic, etc.).
